mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT DISTINCT FD.F_IDX, FD.REGDATE, FD.CONTENT, FD.U_IDX, FD.U_LIKE, FD.F_PIC FROM FEED FD, (SELECT * FROM FOLLOW WHERE FROM_IDX = #{u_idx}) FW WHERE FD.U_IDX = FW.TO_IDX OR FD.U_IDX = #{u_idx}) ORDER BY F_IDX DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, RR.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT FD.F_IDX, FD.REGDATE, FD.CONTENT, FD.U_IDX, FD.U_LIKE, FD.F_PIC FROM FEED FD, (SELECT * FROM FOLLOW WHERE FROM_IDX = #{u_idx}) FW WHERE FD.U_IDX = FW.TO_IDX OR FD.U_IDX = #{u_idx} ORDER BY F_IDX DESC) RR) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FEED (F_IDX, REGDATE, CONTENT, U_IDX, U_LIKE, F_PIC) VALUES(FEED_SEQ.nextval, SYSDATE, #{content}, #{u_idx},0, #{f_pic})
